price: [Les será dicho:] "Sufran su tormento, esto es lo que pedían que les llegara con rapidez."
arabic: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: dhūqū fit'natakum hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tastaʿjilūna
